briefTitle: Registry for Intra-Operative Radiotherapy During Breast Conserving Surgery in Patients With Early Stage Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Research Registry for Intra-Operative Radiotherapy (IORT) During Breast Conserving Surgery in Patients With in Situ and Early Stage Breast Cancer
conditions: Early-stage Breast Cancer, Breast Carcinoma in Situ, Breast Neoplasms
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Clinical stage Tis, T1, or T2(≤ 3cm), N0, M0 (AJCC Classification)
* Unifocal Disease
* Candidate for breast-conserving surgery
* Recommended treatment by multidisciplinary team

Exclusion Criteria:

* Clinical stage T3-4, N1-3, M1
* Multifocal disease
